mapper.select: SELECT HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(user_name,#{strKey})) as user_name, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(user_email,#{strKey})) as user_email, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(user_phone,#{strKey})) as user_phone, user_pwd, user_phone, user_auth, user_position, user_responsibility, user_class, user_id, user_domain, company_no, department_no, admin_id, insert_date, update_date FROM users WHERE user_delete='0'
